tool_description: AI content detection remover and recreate method by Smodin. Our recreate method is the most powerful rewriter on the market. Our AI content detection removal is also one of the most powerful on the market, working in over 100 languages. There are three settings for `recreateType` of `unique` which aims to rearrange the information and make the text as indistinguishable from the original as possible. The next setting is `aiDetection` which aims to remove AI Detection. Lastly, `experimental`, w...
name: AI Content Detection Remover
title: AI Content Detection Remover

api_list.name: AI Detection Removal and Recreate Endpoint
api_list.description: AI Detection Removal and Recreate Endpoint. Accepts `text` up to 12000 characters, accepts `language` as a two character encoding (you can also use "auto" for it to auto detect), lastly accepts `recreateType` which includes both `aiDetection` (default) and `unique`. Experimental, as on smodin, is available upon request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-content-detection-remover.p.rapidapi.com/recreate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-content-detection-remover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
